errorText1: Sorry, you need to access this page through a search results page.
errorText2: If this message appeared while you were trying to access a book, it means we couldn't retrieve it's info from our servers. Please try again later.
downloadWaitInfo: This will open a new tab.
vocPrecisaEstarLogadoParaAdicionarLivros: You need to sign-in to add a book!
oLivroJSeEncontraNaCategoria: The book is already on the target category.
erroAoAdicionarLivroPorFavorTenteNovamen: Error while adding book. Please, try again.
seOErroPersistirEntreEmContatoNoNossoDis: If the error continues, please contact us in our Discord.
erroNaBuscaPorArquivosSemelhantes: Error while searching for similar books.
oBibliomarNoHospedaQuaisquerArquivosDeLi: Bibliomar <s>does not</s> host or distribute any book files available in this site. All rights are reserved to their respective parts.
